title: Harry Potter 8-Film 4K Blu-Ray Collection On Sale For Best Price Of 2024 For Black Friday
description: Harry Potter fans can get all eight mainline films on 4K Blu-ray for only $56 during Amazon's Black Friday sale. The Harry Potter 8-Film Collection normally sells for around $90, so this is a pretty awesome deal. In fact, it's the best price of the year for the collection. See at Amazon The eight-movie collection includes all of the Harry Potter movies, including the two-part Deathly Hallows. The films in the bundle include Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix, Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, and Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Parts 1 and 2.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Collector's Edition Gets Massive Discount
description: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Collector's Edition $150 (was $230) See at PS Direct Marvel's Spider-Man 2 $40 (was $70) See at Best Buy See at Target See at Walmart (sold out) See at Amazon ($30) Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales Ultimate Edition $30 at Walmart | $40 elsewhere (was $70) See at Walmart ($30) See at Best Buy ($40) See at Target ($40) See at Amazon ($30) PlayStation's lineup of Black Friday and holiday deals is loaded with discounts on PS5 consoles and VR headsets, DualSense Controllers, and, of course, first-party games such as Insomniac's Marvel's Spider-Man series. Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is up for grabs for $40 at multiple retailers, but the standout deal is the Collector's Edition at PlayStation Direct. Fans can save $80 on Marvel's Spider-Man 2's Collector's Edition, which comes with a huge statue, a steelbook case, and the $80 Digital Deluxe Edition. You can also save big on Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales. The $20 deal price matches the all-time low, but you'll also want to consider the Ultimate Edition, which includes Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered and is only $30 at Walmart.Marvel's Spider-Man PS5 Holiday DealsMarvel's Spider-Man 2 Collector's Edition -- $150 ($230)Marvel's Spider-Man 2 -- $40 ($70)Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales -- $20 ($50)Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales Ultimate Edition -- $30 ($70) Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Trombone Champ: Unflattened is out now, letting you toot your own trombone in VR
description: I greatly enjoyed tooting with my mouse in Trombone Champ on a flat monitor, but in retrospect it's the perfect candidate for conversion to virtual reality. It's small in scope, for one, but also VR would let you see through the eyes of the tooter and slide your trombone note up and down by holding the motion controllers up to your face. So it is in Trombone Champ: Unflattened, a VR spin-off that's out now. Read more
author: Graham Smith

title: RPS Asks: Are Steam sales still as exciting as they used to be?
description: It's almost the end of November, which means it is technically but not spiritually still autumn. It is spiritually winter, the season of wearing gloves and using my phone's flashlight to look for my dog's poos in the long grass. Yet it's not the Steam winter sale that started yesterday, but the Steam autumn sale. Discounts are definitely never a bad thing, but Steam sales used to feel like big events on the PC gaming calendar. They don't anymore, to me. Friends, are Steam sales still exciting to you? Read more

title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 858
description: So‚Ä¶what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn‚Äôt, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It‚Äôs just a list of more or less random questions I‚Äôve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Stuffing or mashed potatoes? Both speak volumes to my carb-loving heart, but I love mashed potatoes just a little bit more. 2. Apple pie or apple cider? Um, both? 3. Do you have any Thanksgiving day traditions? Not really, although I do short circuit if I don‚Äôt get at least one slice of pecan pie. I gotta have it! 4. Have you ever hosted Thanksgiving? Yes, a handful of times, and yes, there was pecan pie. HAHAHA! 5. Something you‚Äôre thankful for? So thankful to spend time with my little family of El Hub, Connor, Rosie and Marnie. Our house is full and so is my heart! Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. Talk[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 858 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 839
description: As most people know, Tabs was a demanding employer. He was also very fair to his employees. More than generous, actually. In keeping with his holiday traditions, Rosie allowed us to take the next two weeks off (thank you so much, Rosie!). Consequently, the employees of Tabs the Cat Industries, LLC have been up to their vacation shenanigans, which for me meant blogging while dressed up as a cat lady lumberjack. Makeup, of course, has been on Connor‚Äôs agenda, but she‚Äôs still perfecting her technique‚Ä¶ Marnie has been cruisin‚Äô the streets of Novato looking for tiny dogs with short legs to bark at ‚Äî that is, when Connor isn‚Äôt demanding that they play dress-up together. We‚Äôve all been enjoying this joyful break before Thanksgiving. I hope things are going well with you, too. We‚Äôre here and we‚Äôre feisty (just tired). üòä Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen The post Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 839 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.

title: No Man's Sky's limited-time Expeditions are returning over the next two months
description: With the end of the year looming, Hello Games' exploratory space sim No Man's Sky is - in an occurrence that's rapidly becoming a bit of a tradition - revisiting all its limited-time Expedition events from 2024 over the next ten weeks. That means you've got another chance to whizz through and earn their various rewards if you missed them the first time around. Read more
